messages.pre: Welcome! ConFuzzled TV is still setting up! Our stream will go live at:
messages.inter:
ConFuzzled TV is off the air until tomorrow!
We will resume at:
messages.post: ConFuzzled TV is now off the air until next year. Thank you for watching!

performers.name: The E621 Gameshow
performers.type: We answer the most most burning questions of the fandom...

performers.name: ConFuzzled Fashion Show
performers.type: Showcasing the best talent and creative synergies between furry and fashion.

performers.name: DANGER MAZE FIVE: THE GHOST DIMENSION
performers.type: See our attendees try to survive the ritual humiliation of our most deadly game.

performers.name: Paws On Water
performers.type: Both non-suiters and fursuiter teams have the ultimate dance off!

performers.name: Gamesmaster
performers.type: We see which of our top gamers will take home the golden joystick in these fiendish challenges.

performers.name: Dance Competition
performers.type: Come watch fursuiters come dazzle you with their skills with these individual performances before our judges.
